ing: 1 (4 ounce) package IdahoanÂ® Four Cheese Mashed Potatoes
des: "These JalapeÃ±o Poppers made with Idahoan Four Cheese Flavored Mashed Potatoes are sure to be a tailgate favorite!Â Â Place multiple poppers on a skewer ahead of time and finish them on the grill."
ins:
Prepare mashed potatoes following package directions, set aside to cool.
Split jalapenos lengthwise and remove the seeds and membrane.
Stuff with 2 tablespoons of the mashed potatoes and wrap with a bacon slice.
Broil until bacon is slightly crisp
